section.title: 分析 SPF 记录
section.para: 从主域开始查看 txt 记录
section.screen:
neo@netkiller:~$ nslookup -type=txt 163.com Server: 8.8.8.8 Address: 8.8.8.8#53
Non-authoritative answer: 163.com text = "v=spf1 include:spf.163.com -all"
Authoritative answers can be found from:
section.para: 找到 spf.163.com 域名，再查看它的 txt 记录
section.screen:
neo@netkiller:~$ nslookup -type=txt spf.163.com Server: 8.8.8.8 Address: 8.8.8.8#53
Non-authoritative answer: spf.163.com text = "v=spf1 include:a.spf.163.com include:b.spf.163.com include:c.spf.163.com include:d.spf.163.com -all"
Authoritative answers can be found from:
section.para: 一次查看 a.spf.163.com ~ d.spf.163.com 几个域名
section.screen:
neo@netkiller:~$ nslookup -type=txt a.spf.163.com Server: 8.8.8.8 Address: 8.8.8.8#53
Non-authoritative answer: a.spf.163.com text = "v=spf1 ip4:220.181.12.0/22 ip4:220.181.31.0/24 ip4:123.125.50.0/24 ip4:220.181.72.0/24 ip4:123.58.178.0/24 ip4:123.58.177.0/24 ip4:113.108.225.0/24 ip4:218.107.63.0/24 ip4:123.58.189.128/25 -all"
Authoritative answers can be found from:
section.para: 这样就可以获得163.com所有邮件服务器的IP地址
下面我们使用 dig 演示此过程
